fruitbasket.name: Apple
fruitbasket.description: Apples are sweet, edible fruits produced by an apple tree. Apple trees are cultivated worldwide and are the most widely grown species in the genus Malus.

fruitbasket.name: Banana
fruitbasket.description: Bananas are one of the most popular fruits worldwide. They contain essential nutrients that can have a protective impact on health.

fruitbasket.name: Orange
fruitbasket.description: Oranges are a type of low calorie, highly nutritious citrus fruit. As part of a healthy and varied diet, they contribute to strong clear skin and can help to lower the risk of many conditions.

fruitbasket.name: Strawberry
fruitbasket.description: Strawberries are bright red, juicy, and sweet. They are an excellent source of vitamin C and manganese and also contain decent amounts of folate (vitamin B9) and potassium.

fruitbasket.name: Blueberry
fruitbasket.description: Blueberries are sweet, nutritious, and wildly popular. Often labeled a superfood, they are low in calories and incredibly good for you.

fruitbasket.name: Mango
fruitbasket.description: Mangoes are juicy stone fruit from numerous species of tropical trees. They are known for their sweet taste and are a rich source of vitamins A and C.

fruitbasket.name: Pineapple
fruitbasket.description: Pineapples are tropical fruit that are rich in vitamins, enzymes, and antioxidants. They may help boost the immune system, build strong bones, and aid indigestion.
